Human Resources

The human resources department is designed to support Catholic entities in the Diocese with matters related to lay employees and volunteers. Services provided include:

Training, development and performance management

Compensation and benefits

Position descriptions and staffing

Compliance with state and federal employment laws

Background screening for Safe Environment

Staff

Dara Perreira, Director

Lisa Sakuma, Human Resources Generalist

Location

Diocesan Chancery

1184 Bishop St.
